item.title: Fixing hugo terminal theme
item.description: https://github.com/panr/hugo-theme-terminal/issues/43 I had to add this to config.toml to get the terminal theme to work. [params] fullWidthTheme = false centerTheme = false

item.title: The difference between lispy's convolute function and paredit's convolute function
item.description: lispy convolute ;; These two convolution functions are different ;; (special-lispy-convolute) ;; C ;; Swaps parent with grandparent including their elements. Current element holds still. ;; Reversible ;; (paredit-convolute-sexp &optional N) ;; M-P ;; ;; Swaps parent with grandparent including their elements. Current element and siblings after current hold still. ;; Non-reversible (a a1 (b b1 (c c1 (d d1 (e) d9) c9) b9) a9) ;; C on c (b b1 (a a1 (c c1 (d d1 (e) d9) c9) a9) b9) ;; M-P on c (b b1 (a a1 (c c1 (d d1 (e) d9) c9) b9 a9))
